## DefaultEnvAdapter.getHeadOffset() method

head offset object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getHeadOffset(): THREE.Object3D;
```
**Returns:**

THREE.Object3D

## Remarks


```
     - Head height adjustment based on height for each avatar type
     - Vertical rotation target
     - Container for VR controller
```
